mapper.select: select id, emp_id empId, user_name userName, account, `password`, user_type userType, mobile, email, head_img headImg, `status`, dealer_id dealerId from erp_user;
SELECT id, emp_id empId, user_name userName, account, `password`, user_type userType, mobile, email, head_img headImg, `status`, dealer_id dealerId FROM erp_user;
